summary: Implement proto converters for JSON and binary serialization in the Ruby SDK. This issue was superseded by the SDK rewrite and is no longer applicable.
userImpact: Users would have had built-in support for protobuf message serialization in JSON and binary formats.
resolutionDetails: The SDK underwent a rewrite/refresh and this issue from a previous version is no longer applicable.
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
